nodes.text: Taxiode was a toxic rock planet that lacked moons and occupied the third closest orbital position to the star Abo. It was located within the Lehon system, a part of the Unknown Regions' area known as the Tempered Wastes.
Taxiode was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the Lehon system, and therefore Taxiode, in grid square G-11.
